title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Arishi V3 Running Shoe
description: The Fresh Foam Arishi v3 running shoe from New Balance offers a premium underfoot comfort experience using pinnacle brand technology – built to help increase your style and comfort throughout the day. Thanks to the molded footbed and Fresh Foam midsole cushioning, these shoes offer step-after-step comfort to take you from your morning walk to an afternoon hangout and everywhere in between. These comfortable running shoes help to ensure a supportive and lightweight ride that's perfectly matched with a fresh, 21st-century look you'll love to pair with casual and athletic outfits alike. Thanks to the no-sew engineered mesh upper, these sneakers offer lightweight support and breathability to help take you through your day in comfort. These Fresh Foam running shoes will make the perfect addition to your everyday wear.
